channel.title: HELP ME PLZ My server keeps crashing and its pisin me off
channel.description: ok, this is what i get: [code]java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed ClientHandler: Accepted from localhost:3916 at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:13160) at client.process(client.java:13144) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:136) at server.main(server.java:45)[/code] how how do i stop this from happening? [br][size=1]Posted at: July 18, 2006, 09:43:20 AM[/size][hr]actually, that makes it lagg really bad, then everyone cant get on, but the people still on are fine, but this crashes it [code]Exception in thread "Thread-0" java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: Java heap space[/code]
